overview: For anyone looking for gay family porn, you've found what you're looking for. This gay stepfather and son porn series showcases all the homemade videotape footage of just how close these dads and sons get. When Sean gets arrested for possession his stepfather gets very creative in how he disciplines the boy! Thyle has been bullied in class so his stepdad decides to show him what happens if he won't stand up for himself! Collin gets caught messing around with a girl at college and his stepdad decides to punish his tight asshole! Markus is inspecting his stepson's mouth and realizes the young man has developed an oral fixation.
title: Dad Creep 5
